body_html: I have tried installing cuDNN 7 also. Jetpack 3.1 only comes with cuDNN 6, but apparently, this install of Tensor RT from NVIDIA can update the system to version 7 as well. I did that, but the error persists.
body_text: I have tried installing cuDNN 7 also. Jetpack 3.1 only comes with cuDNN 6, but apparently, this install of Tensor RT from NVIDIA can update the system to version 7 as well. I did that, but the error persists.
body: I have tried installing cuDNN 7 also. Jetpack 3.1 only comes with cuDNN 6, but apparently, [this](https://developer.nvidia.com/nvidia-tensorrt3rc-download) install of Tensor RT from NVIDIA can update the system to version 7 as well. I did that, but the error persists.
